about_the_game:
Ready for a hellish challenge? Are you prepared to play the most difficult platformer you've ever seen, and get back up time and time again after countless deaths because you're unwilling to be a frog at the bottom of the well? Try this game!



This is an extremely hard platformer/avoidance game. You'll need to manage the temperature and fuel of your rocket backpack, collect coins to buy upgrades, and traverse seven increasingly brutal terrains: the Scorching Space, Frozen Wasteland, Dark Castle... Ultimately, you'll rise from being a frog at the bottom of the well and reach your own slice of blue sky.

The game’s duration is a mystery, but even after completing it, you can still aim to break your own records and unlock five interesting achievements.

Story Background: In the near future, unscrupulous corporations exploit cheap labor to mine minerals from the asteroid belt. The protagonist, in order to fund his critically ill daughter’s treatment, must venture into mining. However, he and his team encounter unknown monstrous entities on the asteroid, trapping him in his own mental world...

Detailed Instructions:

WASD/Movement - AD (in mid-air)/Rotate left/right
Space (on ground)/Jump - (in mid-air)/Hold to fly
You cannot jet when overheated; wait until it cools down to preheat temperature. When below preheat temperature, thrust is significantly reduced.
The higher the temperature, the greater the engine's thrust (indicated by the pointer).
E/Use save points and purchase upgrades
Good luck!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: inter(R)Core(TM) i3-370m
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVDIA GeFoce GTX 760(128 MB)
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any PC with sound
  • Additional Notes: any normal pc can play.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Inter(R)Core(TM) i5
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVDIA GeForce RTX 4090Ti(12 GB)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any PC with sound
  • Additional Notes: any normal pc can play.

short_description: This is a hellishly difficult 2D pixel platformer/avoidance game, one of the toughest you've ever seen. You play as a space miner trapped in a mental world by alien monsters, repeatedly escaping the depths of a well and striving to reach your own blue sky, just like a frog at the bottom of the well.
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*, French*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Russian*, Japanese*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Korean*
*languages with full audio support
